sentence: Willis notified at least four state officials of her investigation in February 2021, sending document preservation notices to Georgia Governor Brian Kemp, Lieutenant Governor Geoff Duncan, Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger and Attorney General Chris Carr.
author: Graham Kates
title: Special grand jury considering Trump election interference in Georgia convenes Monday

sentence: Unease over that rise has prompted the Republican-led state legislature, and the Republican governor, Brian Kemp, to enact a flurry of anti-crime bills.
